title: Cinect
description: Developed a movie recommendation system utilizing a KNN machine learning model trained on 33 million ratings.
Implemented using a Python Flask API backend and JavaScript React frontend.
Setup a CI/CD pipeline using Google Cloud Build for automated testing and deployment.
Deployed the service on Google Cloud using Docker images for scalability.
Utilized Google Cloud Firestore NoSQL database to store movie information.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Developed this website to showcase work experience, projects, and resume.

title: Automated Notion Assignment Manager
description: Developed an API integration with Canvas to automate fetching of assignment data from courses.
Parsed and uploaded the retrieved data to a customized Notion database using the Notion API.
Utilized Python and PostgreSQL to ensure efficient and accurate management of assignments.

title: Particle Simulator
description: Simulates particles' orbits around a gravity source.
Implemented with C++ and the SFML library

title: Digit Classifier
description: A simple neural network that can classify handwritten digits.
Uses the MNIST dataset for the training and test data.
Neural network was made from scratch using only Python & Numpy.
Can classify handwritten digits with 96.7% accuracy
